title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Slack securely powers internal AI dev tools with Bedrock and Strands (AIM3309)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Slack 使用 Bedrock 和 Strands 安全地为内部 AI 开发工具提供支持 (AIM3309)
abstract: Slack achieved 99% AI adoption by moving from experimentation to production-scale developer tools on Amazon Bedrock. Discover their journey deploying Claude Code and Cursor for accelerated development workflows, then building multi-agent systems with Strands Agents to automate escalation resolution at scale. Learn how Bedrock's Knowledge Bases and Guardrails enabled secure, governed AI deployment while custom MCP servers integrated internal tooling. Slack's approach combines developer acceleration with production agentic workflows, delivering measurable impact across PR throughput, code quality, and support automation. Walk away with practical patterns for scaling AI adoption in enterprise engineering organizations.
abstract_cn: Slack通过从实验阶段转向基于Amazon Bedrock的生产级开发工具，实现了99%的AI采用率。了解他们部署Claude Code和Cursor以加速开发工作流程的历程，然后使用Strands Agents构建多智能体系统，大规模自动化升级解决方案。学习Bedrock的知识库和护栏如何实现安全、受治理的AI部署，同时自定义MCP服务器集成内部工具。Slack的方法将开发者加速与生产智能体工作流程相结合，在PR吞吐量、代码质量和支持自动化方面产生可衡量的影响。带走在企业工程组织中扩展AI采用的实用模式。

presenter.name: Mani Kaur
presenter.title: Head of GenAI GTMS, Strategic ISVs
